Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Maintaining your aircraft has never been easier with the introduction of our new Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) for Mechanical Components on-board the G280. MSP Mechanical Components coverage is the most widely recognized maintenance offering in the industry (Previously known as MPP), taking the uncertainty out of repair and maintenance for mechanical components on-board your aircraft. MSP – Mechanical Components gives you flexibility to select the coverage that’s right for you and covers a variety of the different mechanical components on the aircraft. We know this offering will change the way maintenance planning for your aircraft works. Here are the top 5 reasons to consider MSP for your G280:
- MSP is flexible and customizable to your maintenance requirements - MSP enables financial predictability and eliminates unexpected repair/exchange costs - MSP provides selectable options which allow you to select the level of coverage that is right for you - MSP maximizes aircraft dispatch availability - MSP delivers a cost-efficient solution to maintaining assets
We would value the opportunity to discuss your maintenance requirements in more detail. If you would like to find out more, please click the link below.
